entry.tran: 靠自己奋斗成功的;(尤指)白手起家的
entry.def: Self-made is used to describe people who have become successful and rich through their own efforts, especially if they started life without money, education, or high social status.

example.tran: 一个靠双手打拼的百万富翁

means.word_mean: 1. having achieved success or recognition by your own efforts;
